name: Moonlight Party
description:
Moonlight Party

Jade Village is preparing a moonlight party on the Mid-Autumn Festival, take on the mission to help the Tea Master collect items as much as you can before the teapot boiling! Hurry up, you only have 45 seconds!

How to Play:

Desktop: Move your mouse left / right to move around
Mobile (Horizontal Mode) : Tap on left / right to move around

Game Art & Design:

by jeansiMong

Music Credit:

Folk Chinese by PeriTune | http://peritune.com Taohua by PeriTune | http://peritune.com Chinese Finger Trap by Steve Oxen | www.fesliyanstudios.com


Thank you! Hope you enjoy : )
